sentences.english: If you want to appear smarter, hang aroud someone stupider.
sentences.chinese: 要想显得聪明，整天和笨人呆在一起。

sentences.english: Well, that was one big silly.
sentences.chinese: 嗨，这该算是一个大笨人。

sentences.english: Associating with stupid is not necessarily stupid, it may be a dreamer.
sentences.chinese: 与笨人为伍的不一定是笨人，也可能是梦想家。

sentences.english: Associating with stupid is not necessarily stupid, it may be a dreamer.
sentences.chinese: 与笨人为伍的不一定是笨人，也可能是梦想家。

sentences.english: The horror of the stupid is that they think themselves smart not for their stupidness.
sentences.chinese: 笨人的可怕不在其笨，而在其自作聪明。

sentences.english: Stupid people looking for happiness in the distance, the wise underfoot sowing happiness.
sentences.chinese: 笨人寻找远处的幸福，聪明人在脚下播种幸福。

sentences.english: They are stupid people who are lost and got here by mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 他们是些笨人，不小心迷了路走到了这里。

sentences.english: People of mediocre ability sometimes achieve outstanding success because they don't know when to quit.
sentences.chinese: 很多笨人成功了，因为他们还没有学会放弃。

sentences.english: If you want to appear smarter , hang around someone stupider.
sentences.chinese: 要想显得聪明，整天和笨人待在一起。

sentences.english: Once a simpleton's wife told him to buy some ice.
sentences.chinese: 从前有一个笨人的妻子让她的丈夫买几块冰。

sentences.english: They are stupid people who are lost and got here by mistake.
sentences.chinese: 他们都是些笨人，不小心迷了路走到了这里。

sentences.english: The globe-trotting dunce is more stupid than the dunce who stays at home.
sentences.chinese: 环球旅行的笨人比呆在家里的笨人还要愚蠢。

sentences.english: The globe-trotting dunce is more stupid than the dunce who stays at home.
sentences.chinese: 环球旅行的笨人比呆在家里的笨人还要愚蠢。

definition: a hint is all that is needed/understanding each other without the need to explain
experienced in the ways of the world (idiom); worldly-wise/sophisticated
sophisticate/man with extensive experience/child prodigy/Wunderkind (i.e. brilliant child)/spirit within a person (i.e. blood and essential breath 血氣|血气 of TCM)
